item.title: Audit
item.description: The Audit Log provides a tamper-proof and immutable audit trail of all events that occur in the Rhize system. Users with appropriate permissions can access the audit log either through the UI menu or the GraphQL API. Prerequisites To use the audit log, ensure you have the following: If accessing to your Rhize UI environment, a user account with appropriate permissions If accessing through GraphQL, you also need: The ability to Use the Rhize GraphQL API A token configured so that audience includes audit, and the scopes contain audit:query Audit through the UI To inspect the audit log through the Rhize UI, follow these steps:
